author: Daniel Brettig
title: 'Have to keep an eye' on players and staff living alone - Justin Langer
description: Those living alone during long periods of isolation will have their mental health closely watched by CA | ESPNcricinfo.com
content: Players and staff living alone during long periods of isolation forced by the coronavirus pandemic will have their mental health closely watched by Cricket Australia. This comes in the wake of the national team coach Justin Langer balancing the personal benef… [+6515 chars]
